rosbag._comment: Name of the topic using for reading/writing events for rosbag format

matlab._comment: Default format to write in a mat file, admitted '1 struct', 'Matrix nx4' and '4 structs'

1 struct._comment2: Name of the arrays inside the struct. Must be put in this order: [name of coordinate x, name of coordinate y, name of polarization, name of timestamp]

Matrix nx4._comment2: The order of the elements, 0 is coordinate x, 1 is coordinate y, 2 is polarization and 3 is timestamp

4 structs._comment: Name of the structs which contains information about the event. Must be put in this order: [name of coordinate x, name of coordinate y, name of polarization, name of timestamp]

aedat._comment: Default version to write aedat files, admitted: 'aedat 2.0', 'aedat 3.1' and 'aedat 4.0'
